name: Geraldine LOSCHIAVO v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (STROUD MANOR). Petition of Stroud Manor
name_abbreviation: Loschiavo v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board
docket_number: Petition No. 062 Eastern District Allocatur Docket 1999

parties: Geraldine LOSCHIAVO v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (STROUD MANOR). Petition of Stroud Manor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 5 th day of April, 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and the order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED. Eidem v. WCAB (Gnaden-Huetten Memorial Hospital), 560 Pa. 439, 746 A.2d 101 (2000). Furthermore, Petitioner’s Petition for Supersede-as is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Christian A. Davis, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
757 A.2d 842
Geraldine LOSCHIAVO v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (STROUD MANOR). Petition of Stroud Manor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 5, 2000.
Christian A. Davis, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
